questions.question: What is the predominant color of the fabric shown in the main image?

Considering the image, what is the overall shape of the displayed item?
Based on visual examination, what type of material appears to be used?
What is the brand name visible on the attached care label?
Can you identify any certifications or standards mentioned on the labels?
